entry.title: everything leads back to you
entry.summary:
Author: marmilyde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,747Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Before everything, all they had was each other. Sharing squished sandwiches, stolen snacks, patching each other up after a rough day. It was better than being alone. That is, until his inevitable ‚Äúdeath‚Äù.Years later, with the job Bruce offered everything seemed okay enough. Until Gotham began to crumble under Scarecrow‚Äôs terror‚Äîwith the help of another masked soldier.Revenge is all that‚Äôs in his soul‚Äîetched deeply like the scars that never faded. Love won‚Äôt be enough to save them this time. They hold onto each other for just a little longer, even if it all burns.

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,440Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

entry.summary:
Author: TheLostOne526

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,569Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 73

Summary: Lucas Allen is a teenage boy with a rare mental illness called DID. After the death of his father, he's forced to move in with his aunt and her family. That includes his cousin Gar. While he is living with them he falls into the hands of Doctor Niles Caulder after both he and his cousin get infected with a deadly sickness. After they both were cured by the doctor they were forced to live with him. While Gar can turn into different animals, Lucas gets affected by the doctor's mystery "Cure" in a different way. While he struggles with the changes to his body he also has to constantly battle to stay in control. Everything changes one day when Gar brings home Rachel Roth and the pair decide that leaving everything behind for a random girl they both just met is better than living in a mansion. Watch Lucas's shit show of life while he deals with his powers, his mental health, his newfound family, and even a romance that no one saw coming.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,335Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 35

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male!
